forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 61F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Generally clear. Low 43F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High near 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High near 60F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy late. Low 8C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds late. Low 44F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 12C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 43F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 11C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 53F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 42F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then clearing overnight. Low 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 60F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
